tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE influencer_followers (
    follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    follower_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE Follower (
    follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    follower_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    influencer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (influencer_id) REFERENCES Influencer(influencer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE followers (
    follower_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    follower_name VARCHAR(50),
    follower_age INT,
    follower_gender CHAR(1),
    influencer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    campaign_start_date DATE,
    campaign_end_date DATE,
    influencer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    influencer_id INT,
    campaign_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE influencer (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE follower (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE follower_activity (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    follower_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(255),
    activity_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE follower_interest (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    follower_id INT,
    interest VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE influencer_campaign (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    influencer_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    campaign_budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
